fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may choose to become the host as you get this role. If you do, the host takes your spot as a player and you give them a random role, then reroll all other roles. If you don't, you may choose a letter of the alphabet, and you will be assigned a random role starting with that letter.
- The host may choose to reroll this role without letting you become the host.
